name: Kenta Takahashi
description: Third-year Computer Science student at a local tech institute
Passionate about AI and emotional wellness technology
Currently building an AI chatbot for co-living communities
Lives in a shared apartment with access to study and collaboration spaces
Collaborates often with Hiroshi Watanabe on tech projects
Hosts weekly 'Tech Night' events to share ideas and build skills
Dreams of founding an AI startup that solves real-world problems

goals.long_term: Start an AI company and contribute to solving global challenges through technology

mid_term.description: Complete and present the AI-powered chatbot project at the community showcase event

name: Sakura Sato
description: Sakura Sato is a second-year student majoring in Japanese Literature at the local college
Sakura is particularly interested in contemporary literature and enjoys exploring new forms and methods of literary expression
Currently, Sakura is writing a short story themed around youth culture for her creative writing class
Sakura is taking classes in both literary theory and creative writing practice
Sakura lives in the college dormitory, sharing space with other students
Sakura's friend from her literature class often studies with her in the college library
Sakura enjoys intellectual conversations and discussing literary themes with her peers
Sakura is a member of the college's literary club, where she has made many friends
Sakura occasionally visits the campus cafe to write and find inspiration
Sakura's dream is to become a published writer and bring fresh perspectives to literature

goals.long_term: Become a famous writer and bring a fresh perspective to Japanese literature

mid_term.description: Win the top prize in this semester's Creative Writing workshop

name: Zhang San
description: Interior architect specializing in cozy shared living spaces and adaptive reuse
mbti: INTP
Work 13:00-18:00 redesigning co-living and dorm interiors for young professionals
Enjoys diving at the nearby park's artificial lake with local hobby groups
Dreams of transforming an old dorm wing into a modern creative studio-home

mid_term.description: Launch boutique design studio in the co-living district

important_memories.first_design_project: Redesigning the common room in Dorm for College with reclaimed wood and soft lighting
important_memories.cats_arrival: Adopting two Maine Coon cats, Bobo and Langley, who now love lounging in the dorm's garden
